mapper.update:
update ccp_information
INFORMATION_TITLE = #{informationTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHOR_NAME = #{authorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUBLISHER_NAME = #{publisherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRIEF = #{brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFORMATION_SORT = #{informationSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INFORMATION_TAGS = #{informationTags,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHARE_TITLE = #{shareTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHARE_SUMMARY = #{shareSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFORMATION_ICON_URL = #{informationIconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TO_OTHER_URL = #{toOtherUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHARE_ICON_URL = #{shareIconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFORMATION_CREATE_TIME = #{informationCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INFORMATION_UPDATE_TIME = #{informationUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BROWSE_COUNT = #{browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHARE_COUNT = #{shareCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INFORMATION_CREATE_USER = #{informationCreateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFORMATION_UPDATE_USER = #{informationUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIDEO_URL = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIDEO_TITLE = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIDEO_ICON_URL = #{videoIconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFORMATION_TYPE = #{informationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFORMATION_STATUS = #{informationStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INFORMATION_IS_RECOMMEND = #{informationIsRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INFORMATION_CONTENT = #{informationContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
BIG_IMAGE_URL = #{bigImageUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
BIG_IMAGE_CONTEXT = #{bigImageContext,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
INFORMATION_MODULE_ID = #{informationModuleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where INFORMATION_ID = #{informationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ccp_information set INFORMATION_TITLE = #{informationTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHOR_NAME = #{authorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUBLISHER_NAME = #{publisherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRIEF = #{brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION_SORT = #{informationSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INFORMATION_TAGS = #{informationTags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_TITLE = #{shareTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_SUMMARY = #{shareSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION_ICON_URL = #{informationIconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_OTHER_URL = #{toOtherUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_ICON_URL = #{shareIconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION_CREATE_TIME = #{informationCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INFORMATION_UPDATE_TIME = #{informationUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BROWSE_COUNT = #{browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHARE_COUNT = #{shareCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INFORMATION_CREATE_USER = #{informationCreateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION_UPDATE_USER = #{informationUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIDEO_URL = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIDEO_TITLE = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIDEO_ICON_URL = #{videoIconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION_TYPE = #{informationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION_STATUS = #{informationStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INFORMATION_IS_RECOMMEND = #{informationIsRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INFORMATION_CONTENT = #{informationContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, BIG_IMAGE_URL = #{bigImageUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, BIG_IMAGE_CONTEXT = #{bigImageContext,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where INFORMATION_ID = #{informationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ccp_information set INFORMATION_TITLE = #{informationTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHOR_NAME = #{authorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUBLISHER_NAME = #{publisherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRIEF = #{brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION_SORT = #{informationSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INFORMATION_TAGS = #{informationTags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_TITLE = #{shareTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_SUMMARY = #{shareSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION_ICON_URL = #{informationIconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_OTHER_URL = #{toOtherUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_ICON_URL = #{shareIconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION_CREATE_TIME = #{informationCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INFORMATION_UPDATE_TIME = #{informationUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BROWSE_COUNT = #{browseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHARE_COUNT = #{shareCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INFORMATION_CREATE_USER = #{informationCreateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION_UPDATE_USER = #{informationUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIDEO_URL = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIDEO_TITLE = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIDEO_ICON_URL = #{videoIconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION_TYPE = #{informationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFORMATION_STATUS = #{informationStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INFORMATION_IS_RECOMMEND = #{informationIsRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER} where INFORMATION_ID = #{informationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from ccp_information
where 1 = 1
and INFORMATION_TITLE like CONCAT('%','${informationTitle}','%' )
and INFORMATION_MODULE_ID = #{informationModuleId}
and INFORMATION_CREATE_USER in (${userIds})
and INFORMATION_STATUS=0

select i.*,
u.USER_NICK_NAME as createUserName,
uu.USER_NICK_NAME as updateUserName,
t.TYPE_NAME as informationTypeName
from ccp_information i
left join sys_user u on u.user_id = i.INFORMATION_CREATE_USER
left join sys_user uu on uu.user_id = i.INFORMATION_UPDATE_USER
left join ccp_information_type t on t.INFORMATION_TYPE_ID = i.INFORMATION_TYPE
where 1 = 1
and INFORMATION_TITLE like CONCAT('%','${informationTitle}','%' )
and i.INFORMATION_MODULE_ID = #{informationModuleId}
and i.INFORMATION_CREATE_USER in (${userIds})
and INFORMATION_STATUS=0
order by i.INFORMATION_CREATE_TIME desc
limit ${firstResult},${rows}
